attributes.action: Allow both parents in their child’s hospital/doctors appointments
attributes.additional_details:
I am having too go too my baby’s medical appointments alone without my partner/baby’s dad, parents need too support each other and baby at the same time 
Allowing both parents in their child’s medical appointments are essential as both parents need the knowledge of their child’s needs 
I understand with coronavirus but we come from the same household, together all the time. 

Many thanks!
attributes.background: Allowing both parents into their child medical appointments

rejection.details: Policies for who can accompany children to medical appointments are a matter for NHS England and individual NHS trusts, not the Government or House of Commons. You should contact your local NHS trust to find out what their policy is.
